block.p: Alice Braislin McClellan, a daughter of Elizabeth B. Powers of Weston, Vt., and James O. McClellan of Hilton Head, S.C., was married yesterday to Joseph Bell Trowbridge, a son of Susan B. Trowbridge and James W. Trowbridge of Princeton, N.J. The ceremony was performed at Trinity Episcopal Church in Princeton by the Rev. Gordon S. McClellan, a Presbyterian minister and a brother of the bride, with the Rev. Tom Hagan, a Roman Catholic priest, taking part.

Mrs. Trowbridge, 29, is a candidate for a master's degree in divinity at Union Theological Seminary in New York. She is also a scholar in residence at Beth Israel Medical Center in New York, and the intern at the First Presbyterian Church of Hackensack, N.J. She graduated from Occidental College and was a Peace Corps volunteer from 1996 to 1998 in Foula Boula, Mali. Her father is a broker at the Sea Pines Real Estate Company in Hilton Head. The bride is a stepdaughter of Elizabeth Geary McClellan and of Ronald G. Powers.

Alice Braislin McClellan, a daughter of Elizabeth B. Powers of Weston, Vt., and James O. McClellan of Hilton Head, S.C., was married yesterday to Joseph Bell Trowbridge, a son of Susan B. Trowbridge and James W. Trowbridge of Princeton, N.J. The ceremony was performed at Trinity Episcopal Church in Princeton by the Rev. Gordon S. McClellan, a Presbyterian minister and a brother of the bride, with the Rev. Tom Hagan, a Roman Catholic priest, taking part.

Mrs. Trowbridge, 29, is a candidate for a master's degree in divinity at Union Theological Seminary in New York. She is also a scholar in residence at Beth Israel Medical Center in New York, and the intern at the First Presbyterian Church of Hackensack, N.J. She graduated from Occidental College and was a Peace Corps volunteer from 1996 to 1998 in Foula Boula, Mali. Her father is a broker at the Sea Pines Real Estate Company in Hilton Head. The bride is a stepdaughter of Elizabeth Geary McClellan and of Ronald G. Powers.

Mr. Trowbridge, 29, works at Bloomberg, the business news and information service in New York, overseeing marketing to Latin American newspaper and magazine clients. He graduated from Yale. His mother is a commercial and residential real estate agent in Princeton. His father is a management consultant to nonprofit organizations.
